objects.description: Monitor newly constructed files being written with default names that have extracted credentials from the Security Account Manager. Analytic 1 - Creation of files with extracted SAM credentials. index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4663 ObjectName IN ("*\\config\\SAM", "*\\config\\system", "*\\config\\security", "*\\system32\\config\\sam", "*\\system32\\config\\system", "*\\system32\\config\\security") | where ProcessName IN ("reg.exe", "powershell.exe", "wmic.exe", "schtasks.exe", "cmd.exe", "rundll32.exe", "mimikatz.exe", "procdump.exe")
